resources.string: The texts of the help you see here is still beeing written, sorry!
The maximum clock that the GPU can use. Reduce this frequency for better battery life at cost of performance.
The governor for the gpu. Please note that some default governors are listed, which do not have to exist! If they exist, the value will stick.
Fstrim is used on a mounted filesystem to discard (or "trim") blocks which are not in use by the filesystem.\n This can help reducing lags and keep performance of your device.
Manually tune the virtual machine properties of your device.
Manually tune the sysctl properties of your device.
Apply quick tweaks to your build.prop or manually edit it with the full editor.
The Freezer deactivates (\"freezes\") apps and prevents them from running.\n Note: your frozen apps will also disappear from your app drawer.
Does the opposite of the freezer, the unfreezer can reactivate your frozen apps and make them accessable again.
Restores the changes you did when the device is booting up.
Should be used only for debugging purposes.\n Logs extra information to the logcat.
